snippet: The USA Freedom Act, bipartisan legislation passed by the House Judiciary Committee, would reauthorize mass surveillance, but impose new limits on such programs.
abstract: Companion article to Page One news analysis about National Security Agency's data collection program outlines effects of proposed legislation in House that would reauthorize mass surveillance programs.
lead_paragraph: The USA Freedom Act, bipartisan legislation passed by the House Judiciary Committee, would reauthorize mass surveillance, but impose new limits on such programs.
